title: Rachel Wins a TV Show and Remembers Her Mum
summary: Rachel Duffy won a TV show called The Traitors with her friend Stephen. They got a prize of about £48,000 each. Rachel was very happy, but then she got sad news. Her mum was very sick and passed away quickly. Rachel had talked about her mum on the show and wanted to make memories with her. Now, she plans to use the prize money to make happy memories with her family instead. She has three children and a husband. Rachel also quit her job to spend more time with her family. She says 2026 will be a fun year for them.

money Rachel got for winning the show
happy times Rachel wants to have with her family
work Rachel quit to be with her family

background_read: This article is about Rachel Duffy, who won a TV competition. It talks about her happy win and then sad news about her mum. Rachel wants to use her prize to make her family happy. It shows how people can face ups and downs in life.
Article_Structure: WHO: Rachel Duffy, a winner of The Traitors TV show
WHAT: She won prize money and plans to make memories with her family after her mum passed away
WHERE: She lives in Newry and was in Manchester when she heard about her mum
WHY: To share Rachel's story of winning and dealing with loss

perspectives.description: Rachel feels happy about winning but sad about her mum, and she wants to focus on her family.
